area.alt: TEACHING YOUR CHILD SEL SKILLS FOR SUCCESS: A QUICK GUIDE*

a.title: Walk for our children & charter school.
Half Day - Last Day Of School
a.span: Half Day - Last Day Of School

div.p: Our mission is to provide a quality education through shared responsibility in a safe supportive environment for all students to meet the challenges of a global society.

We are Committed to Excellence, and we work hard to make the site a primary source for timely information for all users, and a main gateway for improved communication between parents, teachers, students and other members of our community. Our goal and responsibility is to help each student develop an enthusiasm for learning, a respect for self and others, and the skills to become a creative independent thinker and problem solver.

span.strong:
Registration is now open!!
Applications are currently being accepted for the upcoming 2020-2021 school year!!!

strong.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; color: rgb(99, 36, 35); font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt;

span.br: You will need to create a Smart Choice Parent account to submit an application. Once created, click on your child's name, select the

strong.span: Application Tab and then submit the completed form. If you need assistance completing the application, please contact the Main Office at (201)795-4400. Applications will be accepted January 3, 2020 - February 7, 2020.
